attributes.action: Shut schools completely to stop putting teachers, TAs and pupils at risk
attributes.background: By keeping them altogether in a large 'social gathering' is simply not good enough and adds pressure on the Key Workers, Heads, Senior Leaders, Teachers etc to put themselves at further risk.
